edu.ncsu.csc216.train_travel.tickets

Class ComfortClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.train_travel.tickets.Reservation
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.train_travel.tickets.ComfortClass

  • public class ComfortClass
extends Reservation
    Concrete child class of Reservation. Represents a Reservation for a FirstClassCar. Can only have reserved seats.
    Author:
    Noah Benveniste

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Cancels this Reservation by releasing any reserved Seats associated with this Reservation and decrementing the proper passenger counts
      void changeSeats(java.lang.String seatString)
      Releases the seats reserved by this Reservation and reserves the seats
      void chooseSeats()
      Reserves seats in myTrain for this Reservation based on the rules in [UC3,S4-6], [UC5,S7]
      static ComfortClass newReservation(int numPassengers, Train myTrain)
      Method that is used by clients to construct a new ComfortClassReservation
      java.lang.String toPrint()
      Returns a string representation of this Reservation of the format dictated by UC9,S2

    • Method Detail

      • newReservation

        public static ComfortClass newReservation(int numPassengers,
                                          Train myTrain)
        Method that is used by clients to construct a new ComfortClassReservation
        Parameters:
        numPassengers - the number of passengers the Reservation is for
        myTrain - the Train that the Reservation is for
        Returns:
        the newly created Reservation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the number of passengers is invalid or if myTrain cannot accommodate them

      • chooseSeats

        public void chooseSeats()
        Reserves seats in myTrain for this Reservation based on the rules in [UC3,S4-6], [UC5,S7]
        Specified by:
        chooseSeats in class Reservation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are not enough seats

      • changeSeats

        public void changeSeats(java.lang.String seatString)
        Releases the seats reserved by this Reservation and reserves the seats
        Specified by:
        changeSeats in class Reservation
        Parameters:
        seatString - specifies which seat(s) will now be reserved for this Reservation, in the form dictated by UC7,S2-3
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if seatString represents invalid Seats for this Reservation

      • cancel

        Cancels this Reservation by releasing any reserved Seats associated with this Reservation and decrementing the proper passenger counts
